p: Introductions: An important part in the puzzle of treatment of Pediatric Intensive Care Unit (PICU) patients (pts) is the transfusions of blood and blood products in order to stabilize the critically ill children, and improve their outcome. The purpose of the present study is to investigate the reasons for admission and the need for blood products transfusions in a cohort of PICU pts, and in specific diagnostic categories (sepsis, traumatic brain injuries, etc)
